snippet.title: NineSols - Console Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Nine Sols is OUT NOW on Steam, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4 + 5, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Game Pass! 🎮 Join us on a journey of Asian fantasy and slay the 9 Sols! 🏹☀️

MORE DETAIL
Nine Sols is a lore rich, hand-drawn 2D action-platformer featuring Sekiro-inspired deflection focused combat, immersive storytelling, and unique Taopunk setting.

ABOUT US
We are Red Candle Games, the creators of psychological horror games Detention and Devotion.

STORE PAGES
◾ Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1809540/_/
◾ Red Candle Eshop: https://shop.redcandlegames.com/bundles/nine-sols-drm-free-bundle
◾ PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/zh-hant-tw/concept/10007919/
◾ Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/nine-sols/9n3lgkgf3cc2
◾ Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/nine-sols-switch/?srsltid=AfmBOooxeHxjxd5WkXI1QKgcRv-mau1KrnL3qdTE3oHKUl_XQ0vl_VvK

Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/redcandlegames
Visit Red Candle eShop: https://shop.redcandlegames.com/

Follow us  on social media
◾ Twitter https://twitter.com/redcandlegames
◾ Facebook https://www.facebook.com/redcandlegames/
◾ Instagram https://www.instagram.com/redcandlegames/
